TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed AspNetHostingPermissionLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the trust level that is granted to an ASP.NET Web application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 請參閱[ASP.NET 程式碼存取安全性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0001d062-f5cd-44e5-bb07-35155569fdb8)的每個信任層級授與的權限的詳細資訊。
這個列舉的成員會定義應用程式範圍從完全信任 （應用程式由程式碼存取安全性未受限） 的安全性層級最低信任 （應用程式有權執行）。 設定 ASP.NET 資源的信任層級[信任](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded)Web.config 或 Machine.config 檔案中的組態項目。
如果您想要鎖定特定的伺服器或網站的安全性原則，使用[位置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/922ef7d5-da38-4661-b1c6-5b9e5ceda1d5)元素搭配`allowOverride=false`屬性來確保該信任原則設定不能在本機覆寫。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel High = int32(500)

Docs.summary: Indicates that features protected with a demand for any level less than or equal to the trust level will succeed. This level is intended for highly trusted managed-code applications that need to use most of the managed permissions that support semi-trusted access. It does not grant some of the highest permissions (for example, the ability to call into native code), but it does provide a way to run trusted applications with least privilege or to provide some level of constraints for highly trusted applications. This level is granted by configuring at least the trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel Low = int32(300)

Docs.summary: Indicates that features protected with a demand for any level less than or equal to the level will succeed. This level is intended to allow read-only access to limited resources in a constrained environment. This level is granted by specifying the trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel Medium = int32(400)

Docs.summary: Indicates that features protected with a demand for any level less than or equal to the level will succeed. This level is granted by configuring at least the trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel Minimal = int32(200)

Docs.summary: Indicates that features protected with a demand for the level will succeed. This level allows code to execute but not to interact with resources present on the system. This level is granted by configuring at least the trust level using the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel None = int32(100)

Docs.summary: Indicates that no permission is granted. All demands for will fail.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel Unrestricted = int32(600)

Docs.summary: Indicates that all demands for permission to use all features of an application will be granted. This is equivalent to granting trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.
